content:
Join us Tuesday, August 23 from 10:00am to 11:30am (MDT) for a virtual tutorial for Vapor's upcoming 3.7 release. Vapor's workflow will be reviewed, along with principles for visualizing 3D simulation data. There will be discussion on how to get your data into Vapor, as well as how to use its new Python API that allows for scripted visualizations that can run alongside simulation processes.

Registration is due by: August 21, 2022
Register here
